Report.Description: Functionality with reporting advising Software approaching End Of Life (EOL) and current commercial available software version
Report.SearchSQL: SELECT sti.[SoftwareTitleID] ,sti.[SoftwareTitleName] --,sti.[SoftwareTitleProductID] ,sti.[ProductName] ,sti.[SoftwareTitleVersion] ,sti.[EditionName] ,sti.[Publisher] --,sti.[SoftwareTitleActionID] ,sti.[IsLicensed] ,sti.[IsLicensable] --,sti.[Installed] ,sti.[HasInstalls] --,sti.[Unassigned] --,sti.[SKU] ,sti.[Category] --,sti.[ClassificationResourceName] ,sti.[ClassificationDefaultValue] --,sti.[SoftwareTitleTypeID] ,sti.[IsSoftwareSuite] ,sti.[IsSoftwareSuiteMember] --,sti.[MaximumSockets] --,sti.[NUPProcessorMultiplier] --,sti.[OverrideSoftwareTitleTypeID] --,sti.[IsSharableToLibrary] --,sti.[IsLocked] --,sti.[UpdatedByARL] --,sti.[Extended] --,sti.[HasEvidence] --,sti.[IsLicensedUnscoped] ,ISNULL(convert(nvarchar(20),eosl.[StartOfLifeDate]),'') as [StartOfLifeDate] ,ISNULL(convert(nvarchar(20),eosl.[ReleaseDate]),'') as [ReleaseDate] ,ISNULL(convert(nvarchar(20),eosl.[EndOfSalesDate]),'') as [EndOfSalesDate] ,ISNULL(convert(nvarchar(20),eosl.[SupportedUntil]),'') as [SupportedUntil] ,ISNULL(convert(nvarchar(20),eosl.[ExtendedSupportUntil]),'') as [ExtendedSupportUntil] ,ISNULL(convert(nvarchar(20),eosl.[EndOfLifeDate]),'') as [EndOfLifeDate] --,eosl.[IsShared] FROM [dbo].[SoftwareTitleInfoLimited] as sti LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[SoftwareTitleEOSL] as eosl on eosl.[SoftwareTitleID] = sti.SoftwareTitleID --ORDER BY sti.SoftwareTitleName
